desc: 测试报销申请关联出差申请，1对1
name: SelectExpenseLookupTravel

oqls.desc: 查询报销申请关联出差申请
oqls.name: SelectTravelLookupTravel
oqls.oql: select applyId, Travel(applyId, applyName), cash, remark from Expense
oqls.sql: select APPLY_ID, TRAVEL.APPLY_ID, TRAVEL.APPLY_NAME, CASH, REMARK from EXPENSE left join TRAVEL on EXPENSE.TRV_ID = TRAVEL.APPLY_ID
